name: UMovieSceneSequencePlayer
doc: Abstract class that provides consistent player behaviour for various animation players

OnPlay: Event triggered when the level sequence player is played
OnPlayReverse: Event triggered when the level sequence player is played in reverse
OnStop: Event triggered when the level sequence player is stopped
OnPause: Event triggered when the level sequence player is paused
OnFinished: Event triggered when the level sequence player finishes naturally (without explicitly calling stop)

methods.name: ChangePlaybackDirection
methods.doc: Changes the direction of playback (go in reverse if it was going forward, or vice versa)

methods.name: GetBoundObjects
methods.doc: Retrieve all objects currently bound to the specified binding identifier

methods.name: GetCompletionModeOverride
methods.doc: Get the state of the completion mode override

methods.name: GetCurrentTime
methods.doc:
Get the current playback position
@return The current playback position

methods.name: GetDisableCameraCuts
methods.doc: Set whether to disable camera cuts

methods.name: GetDuration
methods.doc: Get the total duration of the sequence

methods.name: GetEndTime
methods.doc: Get the offset within the level sequence to finish playing

methods.name: GetFrameDuration
methods.doc: Get this sequence's duration in frames

methods.name: GetFrameRate
methods.doc: Get this sequence's display rate.

methods.name: GetObjectBindings
methods.doc: Get the object bindings for the requested object

methods.name: GetPlayRate
methods.doc: Get the playback rate of this player.

methods.name: GetSequence
methods.doc:
Access the sequence this player is playing
@return the sequence currently assigned to this player

methods.name: GetSequenceName
GetStartTime
methods.doc: Get the offset within the level sequence to start playing

methods.name: GoToEndAndStop
methods.doc: Go to end of the sequence and stop. Adheres to 'When Finished' section rules.

methods.name: IsPaused
methods.doc: Check whether the sequence is paused.

methods.name: IsPlaying
methods.doc: Check whether the sequence is actively playing.

methods.name: IsReversed
methods.doc: Check whether playback is reversed.

methods.name: Pause
methods.doc: Pause playback.

methods.name: Play
methods.doc: Start playback forwards from the current time cursor position, using the current play rate.

methods.name: PlayLooping
methods.doc:
Start playback from the current time cursor position, looping the specified number of times.
@param NumLoops - The number of loops to play. -1 indicates infinite looping.

methods.name: PlayReverse
methods.doc: Reverse playback.

methods.name: PlayTo
methods.doc:
Play from the current position to the requested position and pause. If requested position is before the current position,
playback will be reversed. Playback to the requested position will be cancelled if Stop() or Pause() is invoked during this
playback.

@param PlaybackParams The position settings (ie. the position to play to)

methods.name: RemoveWeight
methods.doc: Removes a previously assigned weight

methods.name: RestoreState
methods.doc: Restore any changes made by this player to their original state

methods.name: RPC_ExplicitServerUpdateEvent
methods.doc: Called on the server whenever an explicit change in time has occurred through one of the (Play|Jump|Scrub)To methods

methods.name: RPC_OnFinishPlaybackEvent
methods.doc: Called on the server when playback has reached the end. Could lead to stopping or pausing.

methods.name: RPC_OnStopEvent
methods.doc: Called on the server when Stop() is called in order to differentiate Stops from Pauses.

methods.name: Scrub
methods.doc: Scrub playback.

methods.name: SetCompletionModeOverride
methods.doc: Set the state of the completion mode override. Note, setting the state to force restore state will only take effect if the sequence hasn't started playing

methods.name: SetDisableCameraCuts
methods.doc: Set whether to disable camera cuts

methods.name: SetFrameRange
SetFrameRate
methods.doc: Set the frame-rate that this player should play with, making all frame numbers in the specified time-space

methods.name: SetPlaybackPosition
SetPlayRate
methods.doc:
Set the playback rate of this player. Negative values will play the animation in reverse.
@param PlayRate - The new rate of playback for the animation.

methods.name: SetTimeRange
SetWeight
Stop
methods.doc: Stop playback and move the cursor to the end (or start, for reversed playback) of the sequence.

methods.name: StopAtCurrentTime
methods.doc: Stop playback without moving the cursor.
